section_title: Financial limit of Welsh Development Agency.
section_text: 1 1 Section 18 of the  Welsh Development Agency Act 1975 (finances of the Agency) is amended as follows. 2 In subsection (2) for “specified in” there is substituted  “                applicable under              ” . 3 In subsection (3) for “£950 million” there is substituted  “                £1,350 million or such greater sum as the Secretary of State may from time to time by order specify              ” . 4 After subsection (3) there is inserted— 3A No order under subsection (3) above shall be made unless a draft of the order has been laid before, and approved by a resolution of, the House of Commons.

section_title: Short title, extent, commencement and repeal.
section_text: 2 1 This Act may be cited as the Welsh Development Agency Act 1997. 2 This Act does not extend to Northern Ireland. 3 This Act shall come into force at the end of the period of two months beginning with the day on which it is passed. 4 The  Welsh Development Agency Act 1991 (which relates to the financial limit of the Agency and is superseded by section 1) is hereby repealed.
